question_text: Which of the following best describes Metro Ethernet?
answer_options: A long-distance fiber service for global ISPs
A broadband standard for coaxial cable
An Ethernet-based fiber service covering a city-wide area
A private mobile data network over LTE
correct_answer: An Ethernet-based fiber service covering a city-wide area
explanation: Metro Ethernet provides Ethernet-based data transmission over fiber across metropolitan areas, typically for business or municipal infrastructure.
